name: Slice'em Up (Trijam #197)
description:
This game was made for the Trijam #197 in 6:03 hours

  • A Short Story

In this game you play a little robot. This robot is the last one to fight against the Jelly, an alien race who invade earth and absorb everything. You had to stand against it and survive for the longest time you can.

  • How To Play

To make point and kill enemy, you need to slice ennemy with right click until the tiny enough to instant kill them by shooting with left click

  • How I Made it

This game was made for the Trijam #197. To make it I use Unity and Visual Studio for the main things, LibreSprite for drawing sprite and LMMS to make the music. It's actually the first game playable I ever made.
